response.original_title: ゲーメスト ビデオ VOL.5 餓狼伝説 2 最強バトル
response.overview: Game Master Video Vol. 5: Fatal Fury 2: The Ultimate Battle  Color / 60 min / Stereo / October 23, 1993  Shinseisha GV-005  Can you hear it? The roar of the raging wolves!!  512 warriors from all over the country have gathered, striving to become the lone champion!  Each with their own aspirations in mind, they now take on the greatest martial arts tournament...  The "All-Japan Fatal Fury 2 Championship Tournament" took place at the Tokyo Ryutsu Center on August 22, 1993.  This video captures every last detail of the heated battle!  ○Entrance  ○Opening Ceremony  ○Athlete Oath  ○Qualifying Round  ○Best of 16  ○Best of 8  ○Best of 4  ○Final Round  ○Closing Ceremony.  Narrator: Shin-chan
response.title: GAMEST VIDEO VOL.5 - FATAL FURY 2 SAIKYO BATTLE
